Accuracy.description: How correct the final answer is based on logic, reasoning, and provided information.

Reasoning Clarity.description: Whether the logical steps to arrive at the answer are explained clearly and coherently.

Efficiency.description: How efficiently the system reached the conclusion in terms of the number of steps taken.

Reliability.description: The consistency of the multi-agent system in producing correct answers over multiple tasks.

Completeness.description: Ensures that the solution covers all necessary aspects and steps required to solve the task.

Originality.description: The novelty of the approach taken to solve the task in comparison to common methods.
